content: the court of appeals in lecce made a final ruling on an appeal regarding the division of an inheritance the court accepted the appeal partially and ordered the allocation of individual shares based on an expert report the court also awarded the costs of the trial to be paid by the parties involved the judgment was appealed and the appellant raised complaints about errors in determining the size of the estate and the allocation of shares the court upheld some of the complaints and adjusted the judgment accordingly the court also ruled that the contumacious party should bear the costs and applied the principle of succumbency a separate order was issued for the drawing of lots to allocate the shares and the judgment would become final after the drawing of lots in another case the court of appeals made a final ruling on an appeal brought by ge against na an the appeal was accepted and a community inheritance was dissolved individual shares were allocated to the relevant parties and costs for both trials were compensated the costs of the courtappointed expert witness were confirmed and shared by the parties the rest of the judgment remained unchanged the court also ordered a separate order for drawing lots and for the registrar to transcribe the judgment the decision was made on june 27 2023 and filed on july 4 2023

metadata.CASE_ID: Corte appello Lecce sez. II, 04/07/2023, n.587
